executive_summary: The audit of the system agents has revealed a balanced distribution of activities among the agents, with all compliance standards being met. Performance metrics indicate efficient resource utilization, although there is room for improvement in memory usage and API latency. The system has detected a moderate number of anomalies, suggesting a need for enhanced monitoring strategies.

performance_analysis.cpu_usage: CPU usage is at an optimal level of 37.71%, indicating efficient processing.
performance_analysis.memory_usage: Memory usage is relatively high at 67.71%, suggesting potential for optimization.
performance_analysis.api_latency: API latency is at 57.71 ms, which could be improved to enhance responsiveness.
performance_analysis.throughput: Throughput is high at 107.71, reflecting strong system capacity.

agent_activity.summary: All agents are equally active, with each performing 46 activities, indicating a well-balanced workload distribution.

key_findings: All compliance standards are currently met, ensuring system integrity.
Memory usage is higher than optimal, which may affect long-term performance.
API latency is moderate, suggesting potential delays in response times.
A total of 14 anomalies were detected, indicating areas for further investigation.
recommendations: Optimize memory usage to improve overall system performance.
Investigate and address the causes of API latency to enhance user experience.
Implement additional monitoring tools to better detect and analyze anomalies.
Continue regular compliance checks to maintain security and reliability standards.
